summary: Create a new wallet by blockchain ID
description: Creates a new wallet using blockchain ID.

fields.name: walletName
fields.description: Specifies the name of the wallet.

fields.name: blockchainId
fields.description: Specifies the blockchain ID associated with the wallet.

fields.name: blockchainTokenIds
fields.description: Specifies the blockchain token IDs associated with the wallet.

fields.name: customerTag
fields.description: Tag identifying the transaction by the customer.

fields.name: customerRefId
fields.description: ID identifying the transaction for the customer.

fields.name: gasStationWalletMetadata
fields.description: Metadata for setting up a gas station wallet

description: Blocks a wallet by its address.

pathParameters.name: address
pathParameters.description: Address of the wallet being blocked.

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address of the wallet being blocked.

description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific wallet by providing its ID.

summary: Get asset by wallet ID and asset ID
description: Retrieves an asset by its wallet ID and asset ID.

pathParameters.name: id
pathParameters.description: ID of the wallet containing the asset.

pathParameters.name: assetId
pathParameters.description: ID of the asset being retrieved.

description: Updates a wallet by its ID.

pathParameters.name: walletId
pathParameters.description: ID of the wallet being updated.

fields.name: walletId
fields.description: ID of the wallet being updated.

summary: Add an asset to a wallet
description: Adds a new asset to the specified wallet.

fields.name: blockchainTokenId
fields.description: Specifies the blockchain token ID associated with the asset.

fields.name: walletId
fields.description: Specifies the wallet ID to which the asset will be added.

description: Retrieves all wallets and their assets.

queryParameters.name: StartDate
queryParameters.description: Specifies the start date for the wallet request.

queryParameters.name: EndDate
queryParameters.description: Specifies the end date for the wallet request.

queryParameters.name: BlockchainId
queryParameters.description: Specifies the blockchain ID associated with the wallet request.

queryParameters.name: IsMainGasStation
queryParameters.description: Indicates if the wallet is the main gas station.
